definition: value/(to be) worth/to happen to/to be on duty
structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to
to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished
to inject/to pour into/to concentrate/to pay attention/stake (gambling)/classifier for sums of money/variant of 註|注[zhu4]
Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]

sentences.english: It is worth noting that the report also found the American border to be atr isk.
sentences.chinese: 值得注意的是，報告同時發現，美國邊界亦岌岌可危。

sentences.english: The choice of officers also deserves serious attention.
sentences.chinese: 現在軍隊裏的幹部問題很值得注意。

sentences.english: As to the subjective and objective conditions in Kiangsi, they well deserve our attention.
sentences.chinese: 至於江西的主觀客觀條件是很值得注意的。

sentences.english: The update of the user experience is probably the most noticeable update.
sentences.chinese: 其中用戶體驗的更新也許是最值得注意的更新。

sentences.english: The other thing you'll notice from the chart, again, is the quality of the comparables.
sentences.chinese: 表格中另一個值得注意的事項是這項對比的含金量。

sentences.english: Of interest is the plate upon which the divisional insignia has been painted.
sentences.chinese: 值得注意的是塗有該師臨時師徽的鐵片。

sentences.english: The request is notable for its size.
sentences.chinese: 這個需求值得注意的是它的大小。

sentences.english: Another noteworthy enhancement is the introduction of plug-in architecture.
sentences.chinese: 另一個值得注意的改進是插件架構的引入。

sentences.english: You did it in a way that made us take note.
sentences.chinese: 要讓我們覺得值得注意，值得記下來。

sentences.english: On these points, the Upper Permian reef limestones in Liuqiao area would be of significance for the future exploration of oil and natural gas.
sentences.chinese: 研究區上二疊統礁灰巖是值得注意的油氣勘探遠景區。

sentences.english: Note the tall, pink, columnar nature of the epithelial cells.
sentences.chinese: 值得注意的是上皮細胞呈現其原本的粉紅色高柱狀。

sentences.english: It can be noted that the concept of reasonable foreseeability is used often by the law.
sentences.chinese: 值得注意的是法律上經常使用合理預見這一概念。
他的惡劣行爲值得注意。

sentences.english: There are a few notable limitations to the above approach.
sentences.chinese: 上面這種方法中有幾個值得注意的侷限性。

sentences.english: Remarkably, the total lunar eclipse coincided with the date of the December Solstice.
sentences.chinese: 值得注意的是，這次月全食恰好發生在冬至日。

sentences.english: In addition to, the entertainment women by singing songs appeared largely was also a very important phenomenon.
sentences.chinese: 還值得注意的是詩歌中歌伎形象大量出現。

definition: apart from this/in addition to this
from this, it can be seen that...
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
to get rid of/to remove/to exclude/to eliminate/to wipe out/to divide/except/not including
in fact/in reality/actually/as a matter of fact/de facto/ipso facto
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
